mods.name: Dildo!

mods.name: Stock Events
mods.author: Fantos (Code), Zaxon Rapial (Scenes)
mods.description: (Requires Rat Species mod!) This is a mod where you can find different characters randomly in the main hall public punishment area. So far there is only one character but planning to expand it, and if you are interested to help expanding the mod, please DM me. It comes in two version, one come with Rat Species module included since the mod depend on it, but if you have it just use the other version.

mods.name: Stock Events + Rat Species
mods.author: Fantos (Code), Zaxon Rapial (Scenes)
mods.description: This is a mod where you can find different characters randomly in the main hall public punishment area. So far there is only one character but planning to expand it, and if you are interested to help expanding the mod, please DM me. It comes in two version, one come with Rat Species module included since the mod depend on it, but if you have it just use the other version.

mods.name: Horny Bat
mods.author: Sority Arikua
mods.description: Adds a new hidden bat to the game for people to find and use. The bat can be used on self or opponent to remove lust and add some pain.

mods.name: Max-Maxou weapon vender
mods.author: Fantos (Code), Max-Maxou (Idea/Graphics), Zaxon Rapial (Scenes)
mods.description: Adds Max-Maxou to the game as a weapons vender, He'll sell shivs and upgrade/repair shock batons. Still WIP as there is a an armor set planned but I'm still working on the quest to get said armor. Feedback is appreciated.

mods.name: Harrow
mods.author: Exceeder
mods.description: This is, for now, an encounter that can occur if the player is in the stocks, with a slightly modified second encounter. Hoping to make more of these in the future!

mods.name: Chet Encounter
mods.author: Poofy
mods.description:
A prototype with a dom cellmate named Chet involving permanent chastity. The cage is removed after the module's story is complete.
Changelog:
* more Chet events added
* Chet's cage is no longer sold by the announcer
* Chet's cage should be no longer placeable by other npcs
* Chet events should no longer happen as frequently
